text.prq: Eero piñanatiro iina Yompiri, amaenkari inati.
text.es: No hables con la esposa de Yompiri porque es celoso.
text.en: Don't talk to Yompiri's wife because he is a jealous man.

text.es: Responde a tu tío, te está llamando.
text.en: Answer back to your uncle, he is calling you.
